00121 void AddrMap::map_addr(Request* req)
00122 {
00123     req->lowerBits = req->address & COLUMN_SIZE;
00124         //TODO needs to set this
00125     req->channelNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(DRAM_SIZE)-(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_CHANNELS)) ) & (NO_OF_CHANNELS-1);   
00126                                                                                         // Masking higher bits to find channel No;
00127 
00128     switch (addr_map_scheme)
00129     {
00130       case PAGE_INTERLEAVING:
00131       {         // equivalent to l:r:b:c:v      As defined by Bruce Jacob's book.   c:v = n:z
00132 
00133         req->columnNo = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_COLUMNS-1);// Masking lower bits to find Column No.
00134         req->bankNo = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_BANKS-1);       // Masking the next b bits after page bits
00135         req->rowNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)) ) & (NO_OF_ROWS-1);// Masking the next r bits  
00136         req->rankNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS)) ) & (NO_OF_RANKS-1);  
00137                                                                                                         // Masking next l bits
00138         break;
00139       }
00140 
00141       case PERMUTATION:
00142       {         // equivalent to l:r:(b xor tlower):c:v
00143 
00144         Addr_t temp;
00145         Addr_t temp2;   
00146         req->columnNo = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_COLUMNS-1);// Masking lower bits to find Column No.
00147         temp = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_BANKS-1);              // Masking the next b bits after page bits
00148         temp2 = (req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(DRAM_SIZE)-TAG_BITS)) & (NO_OF_BANKS-1); // Masking lower b bits of the tag
00149         req->bankNo = temp ^ temp2;     
00150         req->rowNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)) ) & (NO_OF_ROWS-1);// Masking the next r bits  
00151         req->rankNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS)) ) & (NO_OF_RANKS-1);  
00152                                                                                                         // Masking next l bits  
00153         break;
00154       }
00155 
00156       case CACHELINE_INTERLEAVING:
00157       {         // equivalent to l:r:n:b:z      
00158         
00159         Addr_t temp;
00160         Addr_t temp2;   
00161         temp = (req->address & (CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE-1)) >> (Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE);// Masking upper z bits only and leaving bits of the col
00162         req->bankNo = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_BANKS-1); // Masking the next b bits after cache block bits
00163         temp2 = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)) ) & (BLOCKS_PER_ROW-1);// Masking next n bits 
00164 //TODO I think this line is incorrect should be temp2 << ((int)log2(CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE-1)-log2(COLUMN_SIZE)) | temp;
00165         req->columnNo = (temp2 << ((Addr_t)log2(CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE)-(Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE))) | temp;
00166 //      req->columnNo = (temp2 >> (CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE-1) ) | temp;
00167         req->rowNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)) ) & (NO_OF_ROWS-1);// Masking the next r bits  
00168         req->rankNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS)) ) & (NO_OF_RANKS-1);  
00169                                                                                                         // Masking next l bits
00170         break;
00171       }
00172       
00173       case SWAPPING:
00174       {         // equivalent to l:(rupper:n:rlower):b:(rmiddle):z //(v+clower) n is put in lower tag bits
00175         
00176         unsigned short n = log2(BLOCKS_PER_ROW);                // n is a design parameter, should be changed to explore 
00177         Addr_t nMask = BLOCKS_PER_ROW-1;
00178         Addr_t colMask;
00179         Addr_t rowMask;
00180         Addr_t temp;
00181         Addr_t temp2;
00182         req->columnNo = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_COLUMNS-1); // Masking lower bits to find req->columnNo temporarily
00183         req->bankNo = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_BANKS-1);       // Masking the next b bits after page bits
00184         req->rowNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)) ) & (NO_OF_ROWS-1);  
00185                                                                         // Masking the next r bits to find req->rowNo temporarily
00187         temp = ((req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)-n)) & nMask) << ((Addr_t)log2(DRAM_SIZE)-TAG_BITS-(Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)-(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS));
00188         temp2 = ((req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(DRAM_SIZE)-TAG_BITS)) & nMask) << ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)-n); 
00189                                                                                 // Rip the required bits out from req->address
00190         cout << hex << temp << "        " << temp2 << "    " << req->rowNo << "   " << req->columnNo << endl;
00191         colMask = nMask << ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)-n);          // Shift the mask to required bit position
00192         rowMask = nMask << ((Addr_t)log2(DRAM_SIZE)-TAG_BITS-(Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)-(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)); 
00193         cout << colMask << "  " <<  rowMask << endl;
00194         req->columnNo = (req->columnNo & (~colMask)) | temp2;   // Make the required bit position of column zero & or with temp2
00195         req->columnNo = req->columnNo >> (Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE);     // Remove the lower z bits from column no       
00196         req->rowNo = (req->rowNo & (~rowMask)) | temp;
00197         req->rankNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS)) ) & (NO_OF_RANKS-1);  
00198                                                                                                         // Masking next l bits  
00199         break;
00200       }
00201       case GENERIC:
00202       {         // l:r:b:c:v    User should swap these around to find a good result
00203 
00205         Addr_t zbits = (req->address & (CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE-1)); //>> (int)log2(COLUMN_SIZE);      
00206         Addr_t nbits = ( (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE)) & (BLOCKS_PER_ROW-1) ) << (Addr_t)log2(CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE);
00207         Addr_t bbits = ( (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_BANKS-1) ) << (Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE);
00208         Addr_t rbits = ( (req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS))) & (NO_OF_ROWS-1) ) 
00209                                     << ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS));
00210         Addr_t lbits = ( (req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS)) ) & (NO_OF_RANKS-1) )
00211                                     <<  ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS));// Masking next l bits
00213 //      cout << zbits << " " << nbits << endl; 
00214         req->columnNo = (zbits | nbits) >> (Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE);   // Oring lower and removing column bits to find Column No
00215         req->bankNo = bbits >> (Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE);          // Taking bbits shifting to LSBs
00216         req->rowNo = rbits >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)); // Taking rbits and shifting to LSBs
00217         req->rankNo = lbits >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS));//Taking lbits, shifting to LSBs
00218         break;
00219       }
00220       case NO_SCHEME:
00221       {         // no scheme   equivalent to l:b:r:c:v
00222 
00223         req->columnNo = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_COLUMNS-1);// Masking lower bits to find Column No.
00224         req->rowNo = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_ROWS-1);         // Masking the next r bits       
00225         req->bankNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS)) ) & (NO_OF_BANKS-1);  // Masking the next b bits
00226         req->rankNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS)) ) & (NO_OF_RANKS-1);  
00227                                                                                                         // Masking next l bits 
00228         break;
00229       }
00230       case LOCAL_ADDR_MAP:
00231       {
00232 
00233         Addr_t tempAddr = req->address;
00234         unsigned int lowerBit = BANK_BITS;   
00235         unsigned int upperBit = lowerBit+(int)log2(NO_OF_BANKS);
00236         unsigned int lower_mask = pow(2.0,lowerBit*1.0)-1;
00237         ullint upper_mask = (0xFFFFFFFF)-(pow(2.0,upperBit*1.0)-1);
00238         unsigned int lower_addr = (tempAddr) & lower_mask;
00239         ullint upper_addr = ((tempAddr) & upper_mask) >> (int)log2(NO_OF_BANKS);
00240         req->bankNo = ((tempAddr) >> lowerBit) & (NO_OF_BANKS-1);
00241 //      cout << hex << req->bankNo << " " << tempAddr << " " << upper_addr << " " << lower_addr << " " << endl;
00242         tempAddr = upper_addr | lower_addr;
00243         req->columnNo = (tempAddr >> (Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_COLUMNS-1); //    Masking lower bits to find Column No.
00244         req->rowNo = (tempAddr >> (Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_ROWS-1);          // Masking the next r bits       
00245         req->rankNo = ( tempAddr >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS)) ) & (NO_OF_RANKS-1);
00246         break;
00247       }
00248       default:
00249       {
00250           cout << " ERROR : addr_map.cc line 234" << endl;
00251           exit(1);
00252       }
00253     }
00254 }
